GLUE-Math with POSIX standard
Test Suite:
  Cubic Root

  This function is not as the cube root sqrt3(x),
  returns the solution in the form of x^1/3.

[Calculation Test]
Polymorphism Pattern:
  Real variable -> Real solution
>>> RMath.cbrt(x)
  (x)   float     double             long double

[Property of Pole]
  - CHECK THE POLE IN THE ARGUMENT -

  List Table Details:
  arg+inf  := Solution the argument is +Infinity
  arg-inf  := Solution the argument is -Infinity
  arg_nan  := Solution the argument is NaN

  type   arg+inf   arg-inf   arg_nan
   flt  Infinity  -Infinit       NaN
   dbl  Infinity  -Infinit       NaN
  ldbl  Infinity  -Infinit       NaN
